name: Endless Tower
description:
Face the reality is hard?We bring you the real hard game！

This game is a tower defense game,who can survive from the last wave of enemy who wins.

Features:
1、The game use both keyboard "WASD" and Mouse click.
2、The enemy will born more by waves.Also they can speed up.
3、You should destroy the enemy to get more coins.
4、If you have more coins,you can build more defense tower.
5、You can use towers to destroy the enemies.
6、If you survive from the last wave of enemy,you win.
7、If any enemy reaches the bottom line of their route,Game over!

It is a relax game,but in fact,it is not relax : )
